EmailTemplate.name: Catalyst Partner Program.Partner Rejected Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Pivotal One Partner Program Application Update
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Application Update
Thank you again for your interest in the Pivotal One Partner Program. We have reviewed the application for {{company.Company Name:default=your company}} to participate in the program as a Registered Member.
At this time, we are not able to complete your application. We are able to move forward with applications when:
- The proposed joint solution provided with your application contains sufficient information or detail and aligns with Pivotal products. - The proposed joint solution provided with your application aligns to the type of customers and prospects with whom Pivotal is currently engaged. - Sufficient information about your company and product is publicly available or submitted with your application.
If you would like to resubmit your application addressing the items above, we would be happy to review again.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Business Development Team
